edu.berkeley.path.beats.simulator
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  edu.berkeley.path.beats.simulator.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceComponent, InterfaceController
Direct Known Subclasses:
Signal.PhaseController
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterfaceComponent, InterfaceController

Base class for controllers. Provides a default implementation of InterfaceController.

Method Detail

registerFlowController

protected boolean registerFlowController(Link link,
                                         int index)
Use this method within InterfaceController.register() to register flow control with a target link. The return value is true if the registration is successful, and false otherwise.

Parameters:
link - The target link for flow control.
index - The index of the link in the controller's list of targets.
Returns:
A boolean indicating success of the registration.

deregisterSpeedController

protected boolean deregisterSpeedController(Link link)
Use this method within InterfaceController.deregister() to deregister speed control with a target link. The return value is true if the deregistration is successful, and false otherwise.

Parameters:
link - The target link for speed control.
Returns:
A boolean indicating success of the deregistration.
